revision.comment: move {{wikipedia}} line to top of etym section
revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{af|en|xeno-|-glossia}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|en|/ˌziːnəˈɡlɒsi.ə/|/ˌzɛnəˈɡlɒsi.ə/}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # {{syn of|en|xenoglossy|t=knowledge of a language one has never learned}}. ---- ==Italian== {{wikipedia|lang=it}} ===Noun=== {{it-noun|f}} # [[xenoglossy]]
